name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Senior Support Engineer with expertise in **Incident Management** and **Problem Management**, leveraging **Jira** and **Confluence** for effective issue tracking and documentation. Proficient in monitoring and performance tools such as **Datadog** and **Grafana** to ensure high availability and reliability of applications. Highly skilled in web technologies, demonstrating a solid understanding of complex system operations across diverse sectors, including healthcare and finance. Excellent communication skills, capable of working under stress and maintaining composure in challenging situations, while fostering a culture of self-learning and continuous improvement.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Jira** and **Confluence** to track and manage incidents, achieving a resolution rate of **95%** on first-response tickets.
Implemented effective **Incident Management** and **Problem Management** strategies, reducing recurring issues by **40%** through detailed root cause analysis.
Employed **Datadog** and **Grafana** to monitor system performance, achieving a **99.9%** uptime across applications.
Maintained detailed documentation to ensure knowledge transfer and support efficiency, enhancing team communication.
Demonstrated exceptional **communication skills** within cross-functional teams, leading to streamlined troubleshooting processes and improved service delivery.
Applied a **detail-oriented** approach to evaluate system alerts and logs, effectively mitigating on-call stress and improving incident response times.
Showcased **self-learning** abilities by quickly adopting new technologies and tools, contributing to team expertise in **Web Technologies**.

- Effectively utilized **Incident Management** tools such as **Jira** and **Confluence** to streamline issue tracking and resolution processes, achieving a **25% reduction** in response times for ticketing and customer support.
- Applied **Problem Management** strategies to design a notification system with **Kafka**, resulting in a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
- Leveraged **Web Technologies** including **Vue.js** and **D3.js** to create a customer insights dashboard, leading to a **20% improvement** in resolution rates.
- Employed **Datadog** and **Grafana** for monitoring and analytics, enhancing system performance and issue identification.
- Demonstrated exceptional **Communication** skills while collaborating with cross-functional teams to automate testing and deployment using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent release process.
- Utilized **AWS EC2**, **Docker**, and **Terraform** to deploy the platform, reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%.**
- Showcased **Detail Oriented** and **Stress Resistant** skills in managing high-priority incidents while maintaining operational efficiency.
- Engaged in continuous **Self-Learning** to stay updated with the latest technologies and best practices in support engineering.

Utilized **Jira** and **Confluence** for efficient **Incident Management** and **Problem Management**, ensuring timely resolution of issues.
Monitored system metrics using **Datadog** and **Grafana**, enhancing incident response times by 25%.
Communicated complex technical issues clearly to stakeholders, fostering better collaboration and understanding.
Maintained detailed documentation of procedures, contributing to a 15% improvement in team efficiency.
Demonstrated a self-learning attitude by quickly mastering new tools and technologies, thereby reducing onboarding time for new software by 20%.
Provided support during high-pressure situations while remaining detail-oriented, resulting in a consistent track record of successful incident resolution.
